context_history.content: I want to learn about: css. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is the language used to style the visual presentation of web pages. While HTML provides the structure or 'bones' of a site, CSS provides the 'skin' by controlling colors, fonts, and layout.

visual_content.detail: HTML (Structure), CSS (Style), Final Website, CSS transforms raw HTML into a visual design.
